sentence: Mr  Flickinger,  33,  a  US-Canadian,  was  one  of  seven  people  killed  in  a  strike  on  a  World  Central  Kitchen  convoy.

article_title: Gaza charity worker's death was a crime, say parents
sentence: Speaking  from  Quebec,  they  said  he  and  the  other  workers  were  killed  while  travelling  on  a  road  designated  by  Israel  as  a  safe  humanitarian  route.

article_title: Gaza charity worker's death was a crime, say parents
sentence: Mr  Flickinger  said  the  charity  had  reported  24  hours  in  advance  that  their  convoy  would  be  dropping  food  at  a  warehouse,  and  stayed  in  touch  with  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  throughout  the  process,  But  still  Israel  attacked  and  "they  continued  firing  until  all  the  workers  were  dead,"  he  said.
